summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Wednesday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: Jan. 25
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Wednesday, with six gaining and 12 declining.
Bitcoin fell 0.5% to $22,936 by market close.
